nodes.text: Star Wars Annual 2019 is a canon reference and activity book featuring content from the films Star Wars: The Last Jedi and Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was written by Ned Hartley and published by Egmont UK Ltd on August 9, 2018.
The perfect gift for Star Wars fans, with puzzles, games, activities, facts and posters! Featuring The Last Jedi, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and much more.
